maraya rangiwa pannagena handa pane thirikkale giya hati.rangige ayiyala sat eka samanga marayage lomu dahaganwena satan jawanikawa.rangige ayiya marayata kaduwen aniddi maraya athin alla le bereddi kaduwa kada damana hati saha in ana ayiya marana hati.eka warama miya noyana ayiya mechchara wela ine gasagena hiti pistholayen marayata wedi thabana hati saha rangi madata pana wedi pahara badata waddagena (slo moshan ) maraya beraganna hati.inpasu maraya rangi ispirithaleta genayanne nathuwa paya ganak husma ada ada pem kathawa ahan inna hati.marayage aluth kallage athath marayage athath ekata ekkota miya yana ayuru athulath athi bihisunu kotasa balaporoththu wanna.
